BR_text.BRsummary: Setup.py should list Linux as a supported OS and include copyright header
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h2>🐞Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
 
 
 The setup.py (https://github.com/apple/coremltools/blob/master/setup.py) doesn't list Linux as a compatible OS - it should. Additionally, this file should also have a copyright header.

comments_0.comment_text:
i just submitted a PR (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/coremltools/pull/564>#564</denchmark-link>
 ) for this
